name: Light Saint Armor
description: The whitesmith of hymn church, Andrew, Known as "Light Saint", Designed this costume for brave warriors. With excellent defensive force, it had no name at the beginning but all warriors love it very much, so they named it by Andrew - "Light Saint". This is the armor of "Light Saint" suit. Blessed by Light Saint, the cost of refining is reduced by half.

name: Light Shoes
description: Light and comfortable shoes, not suitable for long-distance walk or strenuous exercise.

name: Light Shoes [1]
description: Light and comfortable shoes, not suitable for long-distance walk or strenuous exercise.

name: Lightning Chain
description: The chains used by the gods to bind Fenrir, the evil wolf, Extremely heavy and firm. Valhalla's heroes tied it to their bodies for better exercise. After use, You can receive more EXP and loot after 60 minutes of combat acceleration in the wild. The effect pauses after players out of combat time every day.

name: Lionheart Shield
description: The unique shield of the legendary Lionheart Legion has a high defensive ability and can even resist the dragon's flame.

name: Lionheart Shield [1]

name: Little Tree Hat
description: Cute headdress made according to young Willow by an institute that is keen on protecting forest resources.
